problems.title: Secure Authentication System
problems.description: Design a multi-factor authentication system that balances security with user experience. Your solution should address common vulnerabilities while maintaining ease of use for non-technical users.
requirements: Implement at least two authentication factors
Address common vulnerabilities (phishing, credential stuffing, etc.)
Provide a user-friendly interface for non-technical users
Include recovery mechanisms for lost credentials

problems.title: Threat Detection Framework
problems.description: Develop a framework for real-time detection of network intrusions and malicious activities. Your solution should be capable of identifying both known and novel attack patterns with minimal false positives.
requirements: Real-time monitoring and detection capabilities
Ability to detect both signature-based and anomaly-based threats
Minimization of false positives
Scalable architecture for enterprise environments

problems.title: Secure IoT Communication
problems.description: Create a lightweight security protocol for IoT devices with limited computational resources. Your solution should address encryption, authentication, and secure data transmission without compromising device performance.
requirements: Lightweight encryption suitable for resource-constrained devices
Secure device authentication mechanism
Protection against common IoT vulnerabilities
Minimal impact on battery life and performance

problems.title: Ethical AI Decision-Making
problems.description: Design a framework for ensuring ethical decision-making in AI systems. Your solution should address bias detection, fairness metrics, and transparency in AI-driven decisions across various domains.
requirements: Methodology for detecting and mitigating bias in AI systems
Quantifiable fairness metrics for different application domains
Transparency mechanisms to explain AI decisions to stakeholders
Consideration of diverse ethical frameworks and cultural contexts
evaluationCriteria: Effectiveness in bias detection and mitigation
Practical applicability across different AI systems

problems.title: Community Resource Platform
problems.description: Design a web platform that connects community members with local resources, services, and volunteer opportunities. Your solution should facilitate community engagement and support resource discovery and sharing.
requirements: Resource discovery and filtering capabilities
User-generated content and community contributions
Volunteer matching and coordination features
Accessibility across different devices and for users with disabilities
